text: Can you help me find information about my headache symptoms?
Sure, I can search for information about your headache symptoms.

output.name: Migraine
output.aid: Treatment may involve medications to manage symptoms and prevent attacks, lifestyle changes to avoid triggers, and in some cases, preventive medications.

output.name: Tension headache
output.aid: Treatment may involve over-the-counter pain relievers, lifestyle changes, and stress management techniques.

output.name: Cluster headache
output.aid: Treatment may involve medications to manage symptoms and prevent attacks, as well as oxygen therapy and nerve blocks in some cases.

text: Here are some of the results I found for your headache symptom: Migraine, Tension headache, Cluster headache. Which one would you like more information about?
Can you give me more information about Migraine?

Sure, please read the following information about Migraine: A neurological condition characterized by recurrent headaches, often accompanied by other symptoms such nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light and sound. Treatment may involve medications to manage symptoms and prevent attacks, lifestyle changes to avoid triggers, and in some cases, preventive medications. Is there anything else I can help you with?
